prompts.prompt: Install Hummingbot API by cloning https://github.com/hummingbot/hummingbot-api.git to ~/hummingbot-api, then run make setup and make deploy
Run /scripts/verify.sh to verify Hummingbot API installation
Run /scripts/install_mcp.sh --agent claude-code to install MCP server
Run /scripts/install_condor.sh to install Condor Telegram bot
